lyrics:
30 contributorsthe queen lyricsverse 1
oh tonight im gonna show them what im made of oh
the killer queen inside mes coming to say hello
oh tonight i will return
the fame and riches earned
with you id watch them all be burned
woah woah

prechorus
whenever i start feeling strong
im called a bitch in the night
but i dont need these 14 karat guns to win
i am a woman i insist its my life

chorus
i can be the queen thats inside of me
this is my chance to release
and be brave for you youll see
i can be the queen you need me to be
this is my chance to be the dance
ive dreamed its happening
i can be the queen

verse 2
i am wind and hurricane the stormy sky and rain
when you run dry ill flood your pain
woah woah
in between the moments of the lady ive become
a voice speaks through the noise like drums
rumpumpumpum
you might also likeprechorus
whenever i start feeling strong
im called a bitch in the night
but i dont need these 14 karat guns to win
i am a woman i insist its my life

chorus
i can be the queen thats inside of me
this is my chance to release
and be brave for you youll see
i can be the queen you need me to be
this is my chance to be the dance
ive dreamed its happening
i can be the queen
the que eeeeeeee eeeeeeen
the queen queen queen
queen queen queen
queen queen queen

bridge
starry night
come inside me like never before
dont forget me when i come crying to heavens door
i will fly
on a challenger across the sky
like a phoenix so you can remind them of the dream i bore
outro
woahoh woahoh woahoh
woahoh woahoh woahoh3embed
